Posts.Content: LauraSimpson wrote: My family is celebrating life and that I'm one year from the original surgery by going to Hawaii this December. I made these plans but am now concerned that I may be setting myself up for Lymphedema by doing such a long first flight (7 hours) after bilateral mastectomies. I only had 6 lymph nodes removed on the right (affected side) and 3 on left (prophylactic). I did have some lymphedema concerns and swelling (mild) during healing process from my mastectomies but have no current issues. Any thoughts, concerns, helpful hints? I've read the position paper on www.lymphanet.org site. Laura Triple negative (ER,PR,Her2/neu) 2.7cm medullary tumor right breast. Nodes 0/9. Grade 3 Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Long 1st Flight after BC diagosis and treatment LauraSimpson Binney4
